content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; out of fuel with furnace_source holding 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status NO_INGREDIENTS with 2 units of coal and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status NO_POWER, research set to automation, electrical_id updated to 9616.
- ElectricityGroup with id=9616 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage=0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); status NOT_CONNECTED with warnings ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL, warnings ["out of fuel"], fluid_box holding approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam_output at (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system set to [35540].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with status WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holding approximately 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system set to [35540].
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system=35540 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status WORKING)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system=35541 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system=35542 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system=35547 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system=35546 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system=35551 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system=35550 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system=35553 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status EMPTY)
(Note: Multiple connection attempts in steps 912–918 using alternate fluid_system IDs resulted in the steam engine remaining unconnected.)

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Fluid System Identifier Mismatch:
  • Repeated connection attempts using fluid_system IDs [35196, 35239, 35282, 35325, 35368, 35411, 35454, 35497] have failed. Use the active fluid_system [35540]—as assigned to the boiler and offshore pump—to ensure proper water supply.
- Inflexible Pipeline Stabilization Strategy:
  • Replace fixed wait durations with dynamic connectivity checks to proceed once pipeline stabilization is confirmed.
